item.title: Dev setup for Keptn I
item.description: Based on my Keptn slack thread: https://keptn.slack.com/archives/CGS63H8G6/p1634057060065400 I am sharing this here with a paraphrase to the original thread and some extra info. This is so that: The entire thing is available publicly (Keptn slack needs signing up) (hopefully) Gives the original thread more context and structure with some follow up information Problem: Keptn local development setup can be heavy if you don’t have a computer with good specifications.
